primary.name: Boosters
primary.description: Increase D.Va's Movement Speed by 124.957% for 2 seconds. Enemies that are hit take 135 damage and are knocked away. D.Va cannot be Slowed while Boosters are active.

primary.name: Defense Matrix
primary.description: Channel a defensive field in the target direction for 3 seconds, reducing the damage dealt by enemy Heroes inside it by 75%. The Mech can move while channeling, but cannot turn. Damage dealt to the Mech from enemies within Defense Matrix still grants the same amount of Self-Destruct Charge.

primary.name: Self-Destruct
primary.description: Eject from the Mech, setting it to self-destruct after 4 seconds. Deals 400 to 1200 damage in a large area, depending on distance from center. Only deals 50% damage against Structures. Gain 1% Charge for every 2 seconds spent Basic Attacking, and 30% Charge per 100% of Mech Health lost.

primary.name: Bunny Hop
primary.description: D.Va's Mech becomes Unstoppable and stomps every 0.5 seconds, dealing 60 damage and Slowing enemies by 40%. Lasts 4 seconds. Requires Mech Mode.

primary.name: Big Shot
primary.description: Deal 250 damage to all enemies in a line. The cooldown of Call Mech is reduced by 8 seconds for each enemy Hero hit. Requires Pilot Mode.

primary.name: Mech Mode
primary.description: When D.Va's Mech dies, she is ejected out after 0.75 seconds and can continue to fight. D.Va's Mech only awards 50% of a normal Hero's experience upon dying.

secondary.name: Call Mech
secondary.description: Call a new Mech and enter Mech Mode. Basic Attacks lower this cooldown by 0.5 seconds each.

secondary.name: Pilot Mode
secondary.description: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Call Mech by 0.5 seconds. As a Pilot, D.Va only awards 50% of a normal Hero's experience upon dying.

1.name: Rush-down
1.description: If D.Va neither takes nor deals damage during Boosters, its cooldown is lowered by 5 seconds.

1.name: Hit the Nitrous
1.description: Initial speed of Boosters is increased to 558.773%, then decays to normal boost speed over 0.5 seconds. During this time, Boosters deals 170% extra damage.

1.name: Crash Course
1.rewardDescription: After damaging 25 Heroes, each use of Boosters lowers its cooldown by 1 second per Hero hit.

1.name: Pro Moves
1.description: D.Va's Mech gains 2% Movement Speed for 1 second every time it takes damage, up to 30%.

4.name: Diverting Power
4.description: The area of Defense Matrix is 100% wider and 25% longer, but D.Va cannot move for the duration.

4.name: Get Through This!
4.description: Increase the duration of Defense Matrix by 3 seconds.

4.name: Fusion Generator
4.description: Every time an enemy Hero deals damage while inside Defense Matrix, D.Va's Self-Destruct Charge increases by 1%. Max of 15% Charge gained per use.

4.name: Bring It On
4.description: Self-Destruct's Charge amount gained from losing Mech Health is increased by 30%.

7.name: Coming Through
7.description: Knockback distance of Boosters is increased by 100%.

7.name: Dazer Zone
7.description: Enemy Heroes affected by Defense Matrix are Slowed by 20%.

7.name: Aggression Matrix
7.description: Basic Attacks in Mech Mode against Heroes lower the cooldown of Defense Matrix by 0.25 seconds.

7.name: Nuclear Option
7.description: Increase Self Destruct's detonation timer by 3 seconds. Detonation damage increased by 50%. A new Mech can still be called after 4 seconds.

10.name: Bunny Hop
10.description: D.Va's Mech becomes Unstoppable and stomps every 0.5 seconds, dealing 60 damage and Slowing enemies by 40%. Lasts 4 seconds. Requires Mech Mode.

10.name: Big Shot
10.description: Deal 250 damage to all enemies in a line. The cooldown of Call Mech is reduced by 8 seconds for each enemy Hero hit. Requires Pilot Mode.

13.name: Expensive Plating
13.description: Increase Mech Health by 20%, but also increase the cooldown of Call Mech by 15 seconds. This does not decrease the amount of Self-Destruct Charge gained.

13.name: Emergency Shielding
13.description: When D.Va's Mech would be destroyed, it instead gains a Shield that absorbs 209.5 damage over 6 seconds. This effect has a 15 second cooldown.

13.name: Ablative Armor
13.description: Damage against D.Va's Mech that would deal 5.085% or less of its maximum Health are reduced by 50%. This does not decrease the amount of Self-Destruct Charge gained.

16.name: Torpedo Dash
16.description: D.Va gains the Torpedo Dash ability, allowing her to dash forward and pass through enemies. Requires Pilot Mode.

16.name: GG, WP
16.description: Increase Pilot Mode Basic Attack damage by 75%. Participating in a Takedown while in Pilot Mode instantly refreshes the cooldown of Call Mech.

16.name: Nanoweave Suit
16.description: For 4 seconds after ejecting from her Mech, D.Va gains 50 Armor and her Basic Attacks grant 50% more cooldown reduction towards Call Mech.

16.name: Suppressing Fire
16.description: Pilot Mode Basic Attacks have 20% increased range and Slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

20.name: Pew! Pew! Pew!
20.description: Instead of a single shot, Big Shot fires 3 shots over 0.5 seconds. Each shot deals 50% damage.

20.name: Concussive Pulse
20.description: D.Va gains the Concussive Pulse ability, allowing her to deal 141 damage to enemies in a cone and knock them back. Requires Pilot Mode.

20.name: MEKAfall
20.description: Call Mech is instant and can target a location. Upon landing, the Mech deals 202 damage to enemies in the impact area.
